original:
Activation by light requires careful calibration, as excessive radiation can lead to cellular damage.


Immobilization-based chemoproteomic techniques include variations of microbead-based affinity pull-down and affinity chromatography. Both methods utilize a solid support as an immobilization surface that carries a bait molecule.
